text: Konstantynów Łódzki is a town in Łódź Voivodeship in Poland. About 18,000 people live there. Its area is 26.87 km². It is next to Łódź to the east. Konstantynów Łódzki was founded in 1821, which has been built a textile industry there. == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in Łódź Voivodeship
title: Konstantynów Łódzki
